content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, nice to meet you. Let's negotiate the rental price of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm glad to hear that, Mister Schmidt. I'm looking for a fair price for this beautiful apartment. How much are you offering?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I am offering the apartment for 1500 Euro per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's an interesting starting point, Mister Schmidt. I think we can do better. How about 1450 Euro per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I find the price too low.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. If you have a higher price in mind, perhaps we can find a middle ground. What is your final offer?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I expect a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see. If you're not willing to consider a lower price, I'll have to think about it. Can you give me some time to consider your offer?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Sure, take your time. Remember, the price is 1500 Euro per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I'll get back to you after considering the offer. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
